遊戲名稱：降妖除魔

遊戲說明

This game is about a park full of ghosts that suddenly appears, and the nearby residents invited a chineses priest to sealed those ghosts.

The design of the ghosts is inspired by my group experience at school. There are a lot of nasty people who are greedy, lazy, and complaning just like ghosts around my college life.
